definition: the Stars and Stripes (US flag)/by extension, the United States of America/abbr. for Citibank 花旗銀行|花旗银行
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]
USA (land of the stars and stripes)

sentences.english: Cedar columns flare at their base as they prop up the Douglas fir logs overhead.
sentences.chinese: 雪松柱熠熠生輝地在支撐着上方的花旗松原木。

sentences.english: The New York-based company is expected to post a fifth straight quarterly loss next week.
sentences.chinese: 花旗集團預計在下一週裏將連續第五個季度報虧。

sentences.english: The Citibank deal is a perfect illustration of the failure.
sentences.chinese: 花旗銀行的結果就是失敗的最好說明。

sentences.english: Citi first established an office in China in May 1902, in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 花旗在中國的歷史可追溯至一九零二年五月。

sentences.english: Its first challenge with Guangdong will be to improve operations.
sentences.chinese: 改善經營將是花旗接手廣發銀行後面臨的首要問題。

sentences.english: The second shift in thinking signalled by Citi's manoeuvres concerns policy.
sentences.chinese: 理念變化的第二點是由花旗從策略出發點政策。

sentences.english: Citi yesterday unveiled a further shake-up of its capital markets operation.
sentences.chinese: 花旗昨日披露了其資本市場業務進一步改組計劃。

sentences.english: How were paper birch and Douglas fir communicating?
sentences.chinese: 紙皮樺和花旗松到底是怎麼交流的呢？

sentences.english: I also have a Upromise credit card with Citi.
sentences.chinese: 並且辦了張花旗銀行的教育基金信用卡。

sentences.english: As of the end of last year, Citigroup had about 147, 000 full-time employees.
sentences.chinese: 到去年底，花旗集團擁有147000名全職員工。

sentences.english: I am now working in Citibank , previously interning in JP Morgan.
sentences.chinese: 我現在在花旗銀行工作，以前在JP摩根實習的。

sentences.english: Citi's bank financial strength rating is now Baa2.
sentences.chinese: 花旗銀行財務實力評級目前爲Baa2。

sentences.english: The American ginseng additive microparticlesproduced after dissolution can be discharged when the wort is filtered.
sentences.chinese: 溶解後的花旗參添加料微粒在醪液過濾時一起排掉。

sentences.english: Spokeswomen for both Citigroup and Merrill declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 花旗及美林發言人拒絕發表相關評論。

sentences.english: 'Expect political pressure on Citi, ' said Mr. Kopp, a former Citigroup executive.
sentences.chinese: 曾效力花旗集團的科普說，預計花旗會面臨政治壓力。

sentences.english: 'Expect political pressure on Citi, ' said Mr. Kopp, a former Citigroup executive.
sentences.chinese: 曾效力花旗集團的科普說，預計花旗會面臨政治壓力。

definition: Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
Moody's, company specializing in financial market ratings
Standard and Poor (share index)/abbr. for 標準普爾|标准普尔[Biao1 zhun3 Pu3 er3]
